news.title: KNEECAP respond to Disturbed frontman David Draiman
Supergrass at Iveagh Gardens (Photos)
news.summary: Iconic English rock band Supergrass played the Iveagh Gardens on Sunday 13th July, delivering a brilliant performance full of hits from their discography, including classics from their 1995 album I Should Coco.

news.title: Palestinian embassy honours Paddy Sherlock for recent song for Gaza
news.summary: "To get such a seal of approval from such an important Palestinian person is a huge deal for me," Sherlock said.

news.title: Katie Taylor vs. Amanda Serrano 3 racks up 6 million Netflix viewers worldwide
news.summary: The fight card reached No. 1 on Netflix in Ireland, the US, Australia and New Zealand

news.title: Éilís Ní Dhuibhne announced as Irish Fiction Laureate for 2025–2028
news.summary: She follows in the footsteps of Colm Tóibín, Sebastian Barry, and the inaugural Laureate, Anne Enright

news.title: KNEECAP announce "biggest run of shows ever" in Scotland, England and Wales: "The Prime Minister himself can't stop us"
news.summary: The tour will kick off in Bournemouth’s O2 Academy on November 14.

news.title: Hardwicke Circus's Ukraine Tour Diary - Part 5: The Ukrainians
news.summary: In the penultimate instalment of Tom Foster’s diary, he reflects on the band’s unforgettable gig at a military rehab centre.
